short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Download Tracker & Quiz Transferer for Canvas LMS

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Canvas Little Helper aims to provide convenient bits of automation for Instructure's Canvas LMS.

It currently only supports NUS's Canvas, but this may change in future updates. You are welcome to try it and give feedback on Discord @ Cloud7050.

Features:
- Download Tracker: Highlight new files you've yet to download, or ones that've been modified since you last did
- Quiz Transferer: Easily transfer your quiz answers between attempts (still integrating, but you can use this functionality now by checking out the GitHub link below)

https://github.com/Cloud7050/chrome-canvashelper
